```{r}
winequal <- read.csv("winequality-white.csv", sep=';')
winequal$quality[winequal$quality < 7] <- 0
winequal$quality[winequal$quality >= 7] <- 1
#winequal$quality <- cut(winequal$quality, breaks = c(-1, 0, 1), labels = c("Not Good", "Good"))

wine_mod <- lm(quality ~ fixed.acidity + volatile.acidity + citric.acid + residual.sugar + chlorides + free.sulfur.dioxide + total.sulfur.dioxide + density + pH + sulphates + alcohol, winequal)
summary(wine_mod)
```
